pullrequest.title: Fix compile error due gazebo::common::Color and sdformat

content.raw: Ouch. They're all `deprecated-declarations`. Fixing these means one of: not deprecating any methods in this PR, expanding this PR to replace/deprecate all usage of gazebo::Color with ignition::math::Color, or updating just the code which calls one of the methods here to ignition::math::Color. I'll start on option3 since it is a part of option 2.
content.html: Ouch. They're all deprecated-declarations. Fixing these means one of: not deprecating any methods in this PR, expanding this PR to replace/deprecate all usage of gazebo::Color with ignition::math::Color, or updating just the code which calls one of the methods here to ignition::math::Color. I'll start on option3 since it is a part of option 2.
